full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SA LAM GYI RNAM BZHAG THEG GSUM MDZES RGYAN ZHES BYA  BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(CES SA LAM GYI RNAM BZHAG THEG GSUM MDZES RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, AA LAG SH'A NAS BYAN PHYOGS SKYE DGU'I 'DREN MCHOG DAM PAR GYUR BA KUN SGROL NO MON HAN RIN PO CHES, ,BKRA SHIS PA'I LHA RDZAS, ,DNGUL GYI MAndAL DANG BCAS BSKUL NGOR, ,BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
